body:
dude... where's the chapter 3?!!!!

 i'd watch the anime and i kinda dislike the MC so, yeah.... this is good

I got to give it to the artist.
Inexperienced people(people who hasn't seen or read too much NTR) won't believe that picutre has an NTR tag on it.
Hahaha.
@NullHorizon I didn't know that I thought that's was odd for him.Thanks

DoomsWind, the first part of what you said is what everyone should do when they feel triggered. But you're at least partly mistaken about the second thing: there are several copycats of Iexpectedbetter nowadays. Basically, if the comment (only on an NTR work, and nowhere else) says anything other than "kys cucks/author" or "kill all cucks" there's a very good chance it's one of the fakes. ...I've probably been around this site WAY too long...
@NANI and @flytothemoon just pay them no mind. I've stop reading the comment when I see their name. Plus I know he love this stuff I saw him comment on a ntr a few days back about how he liked it.
One free cyanide capsule for every cuck. Limited time only.
Hey, at least IEB is consistent.

@Iexpectedbetter2
This community don't need your stupid comment everywhere and every time there's tag you don't like!!! SO YOU THE ONE WHO SHOULD DIE!!!
@NANI ?! I don't have one, so go fuck yourself!
Get a life you fucking loser. Stop commenting the same shit over and over again.
